title: Berlin auf die Schnelle (DVD5)
description:
Language: German (Dolby Digital 2.0), English (Dolby Digital 2.0)
Region: All regions
Aspect Ratio: 4:3 - 1.33:1
Rated: No age restriction
Studio: FTV Ferdinand Teubner
Release date: 17 December 2002
Duration: 30 minutes


"Berlin on the fly" - pace was always a hallmark of the city. But also because the tourists bring less and less time, here is an overview of the Indispensable piece for visitors to Berlin.
What can you take with a little time out of the cornucopia Berlin?
They city is an eternal issue with changing displays. You do not go to Berlin to admire old buildings. This city something like a "Who's Who" of modern architecture. Berlin is loud and quiet, comfortable and excited at the same time. There is hardly a Greener Capital and bridges, it means there is more here than in Venice. Art and technology, nature and culture, past and present - Berlin has plenty of everything and everyone takes what suits him the most.

Anyone looking for an entertaining guide to sightseeing for a trip to Berlin, will find a great DVD.
Optionally, in German or English are visited and explained all the important points of the city.
